# Home Page
## Header (i.e. Energy General Consultants)
*Subtitle, catchphrase* (i.e. We invented the energy audit in 1974)

**Button & Input**
Click here to see what you can save with us.

**Menu** (links to other pages)
- How it Works
  - FREE energy assessment of your building
  - Perform an energy audit and determine:
      - What needs fixing?
      - How much will it save?
      - What cost?
  - Connect you with the best contractors with cost-effective financing
  - R2B2 Software. Rate, Rank, Benchmark, Baseline.
  - EG-30. Data-driven Science and Re-modeled Analytics.
- About Us
- Our Work / Examples / Testimonials
